item.title: PINS
item.description: score:69 Chances: Pinterest (PINS) closed at $36.51, indicating a +1.05% shift from the previous trading day. The growing partnership with Amazon and strengthening advertising business make Pinterest a standout stock for 2024, according to RBC. Analysts are optimistic about the outlook for the advertising industry and the impact on smaller social media stocks like Pinterest.
